crops.name: Rice

pests.name: Brown Planthopper
pests.symptoms: Yellowing and drying of leaves, stunted growth
pests.control: Use resistant varieties, neem oil application, biological control agents

pests.name: Blast Disease
pests.symptoms: Gray-brown lesions on leaves and neck
pests.control: Fungicide spray, crop rotation, resistant varieties

pests.name: Stem Borer
pests.control: Light traps, biological control, proper water management

best_practices: Maintain water level at 2-3 cm during vegetative stage
Use certified seeds with high germination rate
Monitor for pests and diseases regularly

crops.name: Wheat

pests.name: Aphids
pests.symptoms: Curled leaves, stunted growth, honeydew secretion
pests.control: Insecticidal soap, beneficial insects, neem oil spray

pests.name: Rust Disease
pests.symptoms: Orange-red pustules on leaves and stems
pests.control: Resistant varieties, fungicide application, crop rotation

pests.name: Termites
pests.symptoms: Damage to roots and stem base
pests.control: Soil treatment, organic amendments, proper field preparation

best_practices: Ensure proper irrigation at critical stages
Harvest at proper maturity for quality grain
